strings.Value: "And what kind of sacrifice do I have to make?"
"Why not? I could use the help."
"No. I don't need a blessing from the Mother of Monsters."
"All right. I will bring Evindra to you."

{n}The priestess stands in the middle of a city destroyed by magic, calm as if she were walking in a blooming spring garden. She is clearly enjoying the sight.{/n} "Here you are, {mf|king|queen}. It's a good time. The time of chaos and living nightmares is the perfect time to appealing to {g|Lamashtu}Lamashtu{/g}. I can bestow the blessing of my goddess upon you, if you are not afraid, of course..."

{n}The screams of the poor nereid still ring in your ears, as Tsanna slowly wipes her knife and points at you meaningfully.{/n} "A worthy reward for a worthy sacrifice. This ugly creature has been tricking death for a very long time, but no longer will it return. {g|Lamashtu}Lamashtu's{/g} power is with you, {mf|king|queen}."
"… are not afraid to pay the price. To make the needed sacrifice."
"It's a pity you are still so prejudiced. In this case, I cannot help you. Farewell, {mf|king|queen}!"
"Right! What if you agree, and grow a wyvern's tail! — On your forehead!"

"One worthy of the {g|Lamashtu}Mother of Monsters{/g}. I've already made my choice — bring the nereid Evindra to me. This ugly creature has poisoned the world with her presence for long enough. She will die a final death, without any fey tricks. Her blood will please Lamashtu, and you will be generously rewarded."

"It's a pity that even now you are not shrewd or brave enough... But I owe you much, and will repay you for your trust. Accept my own blessing since you have rejected {g|Lamashtu}Lamashtu's{/g} gift."
"Then accept my blessing, {mf|king|queen}. Along with a touch of the {g|Lamashtu}Mother of Monsters'{/g} power."

{n}Tsanna nods, satisfied.{/n} "I will go up ahead, and wait in a quiet nook. Tell the repulsive wretch to come looking for me, and then — little else will remain to be done. When the sacrifice is complete, you will feel the true power of {g|Lamashtu}Lamashtu{/g}!"

"I beg you, {name}, do not go down this path. We are on the verge of a great battle. Now is perhaps not the time to discuss morals, but I have to say it — don't shed innocent blood! Especially when the priestess of a monstrous deity prompts you to."
"Tsanna's desire to destroy everything beautiful seems to never cease! Evindra is kind and beautiful, unlike the monsters that {g|Lamashtu}Lamashtu{/g} loves so much."
"It's all right, she's a fey. She'll spring right back to life after the sacrifice. Or not, ha ha! Who cares."
